title: Several NFL players opting out of 2020 season including 6 Patriots (Football 7/29)
description:
Brady Quinn is back! On this episode, host Will Brinson and BQ break down player opt-outs including the half dozen Patriots players that will sit out 2020 (6:20). How will the absence of Dont'a Hightower and Patrick Chung affect New England? Will and Brady also discuss comparisons of this unprecedented offseason to the lockout of 2011 (23:00) and which teams could be in a good position to succeed due to continuity within their system and personnel. The guys also discuss Alex Smith's comeback and the Packers and Aaron Rodgers eventually heading for a split (38:30).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
